title: REACT: App.tsx has 23 useState calls - state lifted too high
description: File: src/renderer/App.tsx lines 89-307. Root component has 23 useState calls managing settings, modals, view state. Any state change re-renders entire tree including Terminal components. FIX: Extract modal states to ModalProvider, settings to useSettings hook, reduce root state

title: ERROR: Child process spawn without error event listeners in executable:run
description: File: src/main/index.ts lines 408-416. spawn() for executable:run has no error event listener after spawn. Child process errors not captured, possible zombie processes. FIX: child.on('error', (e)=>console.error('Exec failed',e))

title: Add throttling to mousemove handlers in Sidebar, BeadsPanel, TiledTerminalView
description: Files: Sidebar.tsx lines 81-82, BeadsPanel.tsx lines 536-537, TiledTerminalView.tsx lines 459-460. All add mousemove listeners during resize without throttling. Fires continuously during drag. FIX: Add requestAnimationFrame throttle or lodash.throttle(handler, 16) for 60fps

title: TEST: Critical paths untested - session persistence, PTY spawning, workspace init
description: Critical untested paths: 1) SessionStore.load() - corrupted workspace.json causes silent failure, 2) PtyManager.spawn() - terminal won't work if spawn fails, 3) App initialization - workspace migration at lines 177-207, 4) Window creation lifecycle. Priority: Unit test session-store.ts and pty-manager.ts first

title: MEMORY: Terminal buffer not cleared when tabs close (unbounded growth)
description: File: src/renderer/components/Terminal.tsx lines 11-27. Buffer stored in window[BUFFER_KEY], clearTerminalBuffer(ptyId) must be called on tab close but no verification this happens. Buffers accumulate indefinitely. FIX: Ensure clearTerminalBuffer called in tab close handler, add cleanup on unmount

title: ELECTRON: Path traversal risk in commands:save - name not sanitized
description: File: src/main/ipc/window-handlers.ts lines 99-122. The 'name' parameter in commands:save is not sanitized before joining to path. Attack: name='../../../etc/passwd' could write outside commands dir. FIX: Sanitize name with name.replace(/[\/\\:*?"<>|]/g, '_'), verify resolved path starts with commandsDir using path.resolve()

title: SECURITY: No port validation in api-server.ts (accepts invalid ports)
description: File: src/main/api-server.ts lines 35-43. No validation that port is in valid range. FIX: Add check: if(port < 1024 || port > 65535) return {success:false, error:'Invalid port'}. Also consider checking for privileged ports

title: SECURITY: Shell injection in extension-manager.ts (git clone, npm install)
description: File: src/main/extension-manager.ts lines 387, 425, 530, 539, 588. Git/npm commands use template literals without escaping: 'git clone ${extension.repo}', 'npm install -g ${extension.npm}'. Attack: repo URL like 'https://github.com/test; rm -rf /' executes shell commands. FIX: Use spawn() with argument arrays, validate URLs against allowlist patterns

title: REACT: Missing useMemo for computed values in Sidebar (focusedTab, etc)
description: File: src/renderer/components/Sidebar.tsx lines 96-100. Computed values like focusedTab, focusedProjectPath calculated every render without useMemo, passed to BeadsPanel and GSDStatus causing unnecessary re-renders. FIX: Wrap in useMemo with proper dependencies

title: TS: 30+ unsafe type assertions (as Type) could hide bugs
description: 30+ unsafe type assertions. Examples: VoiceBrowserModal.tsx lines 311,345 '(audio as any)._stop', BeadsPanel.tsx line 560 'statusOrder[a.status as keyof typeof]', Terminal.tsx line 147 '(e.target as Node)'. FIX: Add type guards, runtime validation, or proper type definitions

title: REACT: No virtualization for sidebar project list (100+ projects)
description: File: src/renderer/components/Sidebar.tsx lines 557-640. All projects render at once without virtualization. With 100+ projects, creates large DOM tree and slow scroll. FIX: Use react-window or react-virtualized for FixedSizeList rendering only visible items

title: ERROR: Promise.all() without error boundaries in App.tsx, Sidebar.tsx, SettingsModal.tsx
description: Files: App.tsx line 351, Sidebar.tsx line 332, SettingsModal.tsx line 116. Promise.all() without top-level try-catch. If any promise rejects, entire operation fails. FIX: Wrap in try-catch or use Promise.allSettled() to handle partial failures gracefully

title: MEMORY: VoiceContext silence timer can accumulate if recording started/stopped rapidly
description: File: src/renderer/contexts/VoiceContext.tsx lines 87, 328-352. silenceTimerRef set with 3s delay, cleared in some places but if startRecording called rapidly, previous timers may not clear. FIX: Always clear existing timer before setting new: if(silenceTimerRef.current) clearTimeout(silenceTimerRef.current)

title: TS: BeadsPanel uses multiple states instead of discriminated union
description: File: src/renderer/components/BeadsPanel.tsx lines 56-90. Uses 6 separate states: beadsInstalled, beadsInitialized, loading, error, installing, needsPython. FIX: Use discriminated union: type BeadsState = {status:'loading'}|{status:'ready',installed:boolean}|{status:'error',error:string}

title: QUALITY: Nested ternary operators in BeadsPanel task status rendering
description: File: src/renderer/components/BeadsPanel.tsx lines 664-732. Deeply nested ternary operators for task status: status==='closed'?...:status==='in_progress'?...:... FIX: Extract to helper function renderTaskStatusButton(status) using switch statement or object lookup

title: REACT: Missing React.memo on ProjectItem causes 50+ re-renders on state change
description: File: src/renderer/components/sidebar/ProjectItem.tsx lines 34-59. Rendered in map at Sidebar.tsx:619 without React.memo. When ANY project changes, ALL ProjectItem components re-render. With 50+ projects, this causes lag. FIX: Wrap export in React.memo(ProjectItem)

title: ERROR: File I/O operations without try-catch in main/index.ts migration code
description: File: src/main/index.ts lines 184-207. Workspace migration uses statSync, copyFileSync without try-catch. If permission denied, disk full, or file corrupted, app crashes on startup. FIX: Wrap in try-catch, log error, continue with empty workspace

title: MEMORY: Audio element references not cleaned up on unmount in VoiceContext
description: File: src/renderer/contexts/VoiceContext.tsx lines 66, 200-223. Audio elements created for TTS, stored in audioRef. If component unmounts while playing, audio continues and URL blob not revoked. FIX: In cleanup, call audio.pause(), URL.revokeObjectURL(), set audioRef.current=null

title: QUALITY: Magic numbers without constants (polling intervals, timeouts, sizes)
description: Magic numbers throughout: BeadsPanel line 294 has 10000 for interval, main/index.ts line 83 has 2000, line 118 has 30000. FIX: Create src/constants.ts with named exports: export const BEADS_POLL_INTERVAL_MS = 10000; export const API_TIMEOUT_MS = 30000

title: ELECTRON: No crash reporter configured
description: No crash reporter configured. App crashes are not captured or reported. FIX: Add electron crashReporter.start({productName:'Simple Code GUI', submitURL:'https://your-server/crashes', uploadToServer:true}) in main process when app.isPackaged

title: ELECTRON: No CSP (Content Security Policy) configured
description: No Content-Security-Policy header configured in index.html or session headers. Risk: XSS and script injection attacks. FIX: Add CSP meta tag to index.html and configure in session.defaultSession.webRequest.onHeadersReceived(). Recommended policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'

title: TEST: Zero test coverage - no test framework configured
description: Application has 57 TypeScript files (~12,000 LOC) with ZERO automated tests. No Jest/Vitest/Mocha configured, no test scripts in package.json. FIX: 1) Add vitest + @testing-library/react to devDependencies, 2) Create vitest.config.ts, 3) Add 'test' script to package.json, 4) Create __tests__ folders

title: REACT: VoiceContext value object not memoized - all consumers re-render
description: File: src/renderer/contexts/VoiceContext.tsx lines 466-493. Context value object created as new literal every render, causing all consumers to re-render. FIX: Wrap in useMemo: const value = useMemo(()=>({voiceOutputEnabled,...}),[voiceOutputEnabled,...])

title: QUALITY: Excessive useState (30+) in SettingsModal.tsx - consider useReducer
description: File: src/renderer/components/SettingsModal.tsx lines 74-112. Has 30+ separate useState calls for each setting. Hard to track, causes many re-renders. FIX: Use useReducer with settings object, or group related states: const [voiceSettings, setVoiceSettings] = useState({model,voice,speed})

title: ERROR: No React Error Boundary component to catch rendering errors
description: No React Error Boundary component exists. Rendering errors in Terminal or other components crash entire app. FIX: Create ErrorBoundary component wrapping critical subtrees, implement componentDidCatch to show fallback UI and log errors

title: MEMORY: recentApiPrompts map in main/index.ts never cleaned up
description: File: src/main/index.ts lines 82-92. recentApiPrompts Map caches prompts with timestamps but entries never cleaned up. Grows over app lifetime. FIX: Add periodic cleanup of entries older than DUPLICATE_WINDOW_MS, or use Map with max size and LRU eviction

title: A11Y: Missing aria-expanded on collapsible sections (categories, beads, GSD)
description: Sidebar categories, BeadsPanel toggle, GSD expansion have no aria-expanded attribute. Screen readers don't announce collapsed/expanded state. FIX: Add aria-expanded={isExpanded} to toggle buttons, update on state change

title: SECURITY: API server unbounded request body allows DoS
description: File: src/main/api-server.ts lines 60-61. No size limit on HTTP body: 'req.on(data, chunk => body += chunk)'. Attack: multi-GB request causes memory exhaustion DoS. FIX: Add MAX_BODY_SIZE=100KB limit, destroy connection if exceeded: if(body.length > MAX_BODY_SIZE) req.connection.destroy()

title: A11Y: Color contrast failures - tertiary/muted text below WCAG AA
description: File: src/renderer/styles.css. --text-tertiary:#606068 has ~4.2:1 contrast on --bg-base:#0d0d0f (fails WCAG AA for small text). --text-muted:#48484f has ~2.1:1 (fails WCAG A). FIX: Lighten tertiary to #808088, muted to #707078 for 4.5:1 minimum

title: A11Y: Focus management missing in modals (no focus trapping)
description: Files: MakeProjectModal.tsx, SettingsModal.tsx, DeleteConfirmModal.tsx. Modal dialogs don't trap focus - Tab key navigates outside modal. FIX: Implement focus trap: on mount focus first element, on Tab at last element cycle to first, on Shift+Tab at first cycle to last

title: IPC: Voice status fetched multiple times - batch voiceCheckWhisper + voiceCheckTTS
description: Files: SettingsModal.tsx lines 157-158. Calls voiceCheckWhisper() and voiceCheckTTS() separately, 2 IPC round trips. FIX: Create single voiceGetFullStatus() IPC that returns {whisper:{installed,path},tts:{installed,engine}} in one call

title: SECURITY: Potential path traversal in window-handlers.ts file operations
description: File: src/main/ipc/window-handlers.ts lines 127, 141. projectPath from IPC not validated. Risk: symlink attacks or directory traversal. FIX: Validate resolved path stays within workspace: const resolved=path.resolve(projectPath); if(!resolved.startsWith(expectedBase)) throw Error

title: ERROR: Dialog operations without null checks on getMainWindow()
description: File: src/main/ipc/voice-handlers.ts lines 188-256. dialog.showOpenDialog(getMainWindow()\!,...) uses non-null assertion without check. If getMainWindow() returns null, dialog crashes. FIX: Check mainWindow exists: const win=getMainWindow(); if(\!win) return {success:false,error:'No window'}

title: SECURITY: Debug logging to /tmp/tts-debug.log without size limit
description: File: src/main/index.ts line 361. Debug logs written to /tmp/tts-debug.log via appendFileSync without size limit. Risk: unbounded file growth, disk exhaustion. FIX: Use log rotation, limit file size, or only enable in development mode

title: MEMORY: PTY manager event handlers not explicitly unsubscribed
description: File: src/main/pty-manager.ts lines 370-385. PTY onData/onExit callbacks registered but no explicit unsubscribe on shell object. When PTY exits, callbacks deleted from Maps but shell may maintain internal listeners. FIX: Store disposables from onData/onExit, call dispose() before deleting from maps

title: SECURITY: Wildcard CORS headers in api-server.ts (Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *)
description: File: src/main/api-server.ts line 49. Sets Access-Control-Allow-Origin: '*' allowing any origin. While server binds to localhost, this is bad practice. FIX: Remove wildcard, use specific origin or remove CORS headers entirely since it's localhost-only

title: QUALITY: Duplicated getSampleUrl() function in SettingsModal.tsx and VoiceBrowserModal.tsx
description: getSampleUrl() function duplicated identically in SettingsModal.tsx lines 7-12 and VoiceBrowserModal.tsx lines 53-58. FIX: Extract to src/renderer/utils/voiceUtils.ts, export and import in both files

title: QUALITY: 8 files exceed 800 lines - need splitting (BeadsPanel, Terminal, Sidebar, etc)
description: 8 files exceed 800 lines: BeadsPanel.tsx(1190), Terminal.tsx(1049), xtts-manager.ts(1041), voice-manager.ts(1028), Sidebar.tsx(845), SettingsModal.tsx(839), VoiceBrowserModal.tsx(820), App.tsx(806). FIX: Extract modals to separate components, split managers by responsibility, use custom hooks for state

title: ERROR: Silent .catch(() => {}) handlers swallow errors in SettingsModal, VoiceContext
description: Files: SettingsModal.tsx lines 154,157-158,164, VoiceContext.tsx lines 103-111. Multiple .catch(()=>{}) blocks silently swallow errors. FIX: Add error logging: .catch(e => console.error('Voice check failed:', e)) or surface to user via toast/notification

title: ELECTRON: DevTools accessible in production via F12 (no IS_DEBUG_MODE check)
description: File: src/main/index.ts lines 154-156. F12 toggles DevTools without checking IS_DEBUG_MODE flag. Risk: Users can access DevTools in production builds. FIX: Change condition to 'if (input.key === F12 && IS_DEBUG_MODE)'. IS_DEBUG_MODE already defined at line 33

title: Throttle BeadsPanel polling interval (currently 10s)
description: File: src/renderer/components/BeadsPanel.tsx line 294. Polls beadsCheck() and beadsList() every 10 seconds. Has eslint-disable for exhaustive-deps at line 289. FIX: Watch .beads/ directory for changes, emit beads:tasks-changed event from main process instead of polling

title: Throttle session discovery polling (5s is too aggressive)
description: File: src/renderer/App.tsx lines 347-378. Session discovery polls every 5 seconds with Promise.all() across all open tabs. Each poll makes IPC call discoverSessions(). FIX: Increase interval to 30-60s, add exponential backoff, or switch to event-driven updates when sessions actually change

title: BUNDLE: CSS file 5907 lines - consolidate and remove unused styles
description: File: src/renderer/styles.css is 5907 lines / 119KB. Contains 80+ color variables (many unused), 6+ media query breakpoints. FIX: Audit unused styles with PurgeCSS, consolidate media queries, remove duplicate color definitions. Target: 15-20% reduction

title: A11Y: No aria-live regions for dynamic content (terminal output, notifications)
description:
Terminal output, installation progress, task notifications not announced to screen readers. FIX: Add aria-live='polite' regions for status updates, aria-live='assertive' for errors. Example:
{status}

title: ERROR: PTY spawn callbacks lack error handling for IPC send failures
description: File: src/main/index.ts lines 291-310. PTY onData/onExit callbacks send to mainWindow?.webContents but no error handling if send fails. FIX: Wrap IPC send in try-catch, log errors: try{ mainWindow?.webContents.send(...) }catch(e){ console.error('IPC send failed',e) }

title: SECURITY: Shell command injection in beads-handlers.ts (taskId not sanitized)
description: File: src/main/ipc/beads-handlers.ts lines 70, 94, 103, 112, 126. TaskId is passed directly to shell via template literals like 'bd show ${taskId}'. Attack: malicious taskId like 'fake-id && rm -rf /tmp' executes arbitrary commands. FIX: Use spawn() with argument arrays instead of exec() with template literals, or validate taskId matches pattern /^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$/

title: ERROR: Missing try-catch in IPC handlers (voice-handlers.ts, extension-handlers.ts)
description: Files: voice-handlers.ts lines 91-177, extension-handlers.ts lines 6-74. IPC handlers call async operations without try-catch. FIX: Wrap all async IPC handlers: ipcMain.handle('x', async()=>{ try{...} catch(e){ return {success:false,error:e.message} } })

title: ELECTRON: No native application menu configured
description: Only F12 DevTools toggle exists. No File/Edit/View/Help menus. Missing standard shortcuts (Cmd+O, Cmd+Q). FIX: Use Menu.buildFromTemplate() with File menu (Open Project, Recent, Quit), Edit menu (Undo, Cut, Copy, Paste), View menu (Toggle DevTools, Reload)

title: QUALITY: Module-level caches (tasksCache, beadsStatusCache, gsdStatusCache) grow unbounded
description: Module-level caches grow unbounded: BeadsPanel.tsx lines 35-36 (tasksCache, beadsStatusCache), GSDStatus.tsx line 21 (gsdStatusCache). No size limit, no cleanup on project delete. FIX: Add max size with LRU eviction, clear on project removal

title: IPC: Voice catalog not cached - fetches from network every modal open
description: File: src/renderer/components/VoiceBrowserModal.tsx lines 107-114. voiceFetchCatalog() fetches from HuggingFace network every time modal opens. No caching. FIX: Add cache with 10-minute TTL in main process, return cached data if fresh, add refresh button for manual update

title: MEMORY: Terminal event listeners not properly cleaned up in Terminal.tsx
description: File: src/renderer/components/Terminal.tsx lines 454-597. Event listeners added but not all cleaned up: wheel listener at 454, onScroll at 465 (no unsubscribe), contextmenu/auxclick/mousedown. FIX: Store references and remove in cleanup: containerRef.current?.removeEventListener('wheel', wheelHandler)

title: A11Y: Non-semantic HTML (div onClick) used for interactive elements
description: Files: TerminalTabs.tsx line 27, Sidebar.tsx lines 570-593, GSDStatus.tsx line 152, BeadsPanel.tsx line 586. Interactive elements use div/span with onClick instead of button. No keyboard support, not announced as interactive. FIX: Replace with <button> elements or add role='button' tabIndex={0} onKeyDown

title: Throttle TitleBar resize handler (makes IPC call on every resize event)
description: File: src/renderer/components/TitleBar.tsx line 18. Window resize event listener calls IPC windowIsMaximized() on EVERY resize event (dozens per second during drag). FIX: Add throttle/debounce with 100-200ms delay using lodash.throttle or custom implementation

title: A11Y: Keyboard navigation broken - tabIndex={-1} on critical Sidebar buttons
description: File: src/renderer/components/Sidebar.tsx lines 715,725,727. Critical buttons have tabIndex={-1} removing them from keyboard navigation. Settings, refresh, API toggle unreachable by keyboard. FIX: Remove tabIndex={-1} or change to tabIndex={0} for all actionable buttons

title: IPC: Task mutations each trigger full loadTasks() - use optimistic updates
description: File: src/renderer/components/BeadsPanel.tsx lines 337-345,351-360. Each action (complete/delete/start) calls API then full loadTasks() = 2 IPC calls. FIX: Use optimistic updates - update local state immediately, sync in background, revert on error

title: ERROR: API server missing req.on('error') handler for connection errors
description: File: src/main/api-server.ts lines 59-99. Only handles req.on('data') and req.on('end'), missing req.on('error') handler. Connection errors leave hanging state. FIX: Add req.on('error', (e)=>{ console.error('Request error',e); res.writeHead(500); res.end() })

title: TS: 50+ uses of 'any' type need proper typing
description: 50+ 'any' types across codebase. Key files: preload/index.ts (17,81-85,108), App.tsx (16-17,48-52), VoiceContext.tsx (295,369), voice-manager.ts (259,389), VoiceBrowserModal.tsx (311,345). FIX: Define proper interfaces, use generics, create type guards

title: QUALITY: TODO comments for OpenVoice integration need tracking
description: File: src/main/voice-manager.ts lines 953,962,967. Three TODO comments for OpenVoice integration that need implementation or removal. FIX: Either implement OpenVoice voice cloning feature or remove TODO comments if not planned

title: IPC: Beads polling every 10s should be event-driven
description: File: src/renderer/components/BeadsPanel.tsx lines 293-297. Polls beadsCheck()+beadsList() every 10 seconds regardless of user activity. FIX: Use file system watcher on .beads/ directory in main process, emit 'beads:tasks-changed' IPC event to renderer on changes

title: SECURITY: Missing input validation on beads params (taskId, title, etc)
description: File: src/main/ipc/beads-handlers.ts lines 68, 92, 101, 110, 119. No validation on taskId, title, description params before use. FIX: Add validation like if(\!/^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$/.test(taskId)) return {success:false, error:'Invalid ID'}

title: BUNDLE: whisper-web-transcriber (4.5MB) always bundled even when voice disabled
description: whisper-web-transcriber is 4.5MB and always bundled even when voice features disabled. Contains WASM binaries and ML models. FIX: Use dynamic import with React.lazy(): const WhisperProvider = lazy(()=>import('./WhisperProvider')). Only load when user enables voice

title: A11Y: Missing ARIA labels on 25+ interactive elements (buttons with emoji only)
description: Files: TerminalTabs.tsx line 30, Sidebar.tsx lines 544,551,554,715,725,727, TitleBar.tsx lines 44-77, QuickActionsMenu.tsx line 91. 25+ buttons use emoji icons without aria-label. Screen readers announce nothing useful. FIX: Add aria-label to all icon buttons: <button aria-label='Close tab'>√ó</button>

title: Throttle GSDStatus polling interval (currently 10s)
description: File: src/renderer/components/GSDStatus.tsx line 104. Polls gsdGetProgress() every 10 seconds. Also has eslint-disable for react-hooks/exhaustive-deps at line 99 (missing loadStatus dependency). FIX: Increase interval or use event-driven updates, fix dependency array

title: SECURITY: No rate limiting on API /prompt endpoint
description: File: src/main/api-server.ts lines 59-99. No rate limiting on /prompt endpoint. Attack: rapid requests cause resource exhaustion. FIX: Implement rate limiting with Map tracking requests per IP, reject if >10 requests/minute

title: IPC: Voice settings save not debounced - 10+ calls on slider drag
description: File: src/renderer/contexts/VoiceContext.tsx lines 129-130. saveVoiceSetting() called on every volume/speed slider change - dragging fires 10+ calls. FIX: Add 500ms debounce: const debouncedSave = useMemo(()=>debounce(saveVoiceSetting,500),[saveVoiceSetting])

title: REACT: Inline functions in TerminalTabs and Sidebar break memoization
description: Files: TerminalTabs.tsx line 30 onClick={()=>onSelectTab(tab.id)}, Sidebar.tsx lines 493-539 handlers. Inline arrow functions create new references each render, breaking React.memo. FIX: Use useCallback for handlers, pass stable references: const handleSelect = useCallback((id)=>onSelectTab(id),[])
